content.question: (A) Describe the concept of the state.(B) Describe one difference between a state and a nation.(C) Explain one reason why a state might fail.(D) Explain why multinational states might face challenges in establishing legitimacy.

frqParts.text: (A) Describe the concept of the state.(B) Describe one difference between a state and a nation.(C) Explain one reason why a state might fail.(D) Explain why multinational states might face challenges in establishing legitimacy.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
